item.title: Please need help
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

Is it coming up in the right slot when your wear the mask ?

Eg. when you wear the mask it comes up in your cape slot or another slot.

If so go to your item.java i believe and place the itemid in the slot you want it to show up in.

Read full topic
